'''Vilate''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Golden Age]].
document_data.History: The variator developed just two minor spells during their life. The spells they invented were ''[[whispering wind]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|1661|NY}} and ''[[bind]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|1664|NY}}.
